# Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning

Training Course at IIT Delhi under the aegis of the [Yardi School of Artificial Intelligence, IIT Delhi](https://scai.iitd.ac.in/).

<img src="hero-image.jpg" alt="Hero Image" width="100%"/>

The "AI/ML for Industry" is a flagship training program offered by faculty members of the Indian Institute of Technology Delhi. The course is offered in multiple variants:

- [6-month e-Vidya CEP Certificate](./aiml-6-months-iitd-certificate.qmd) (Weekend Classes for Industry Professionals)
- [3-Day or 5-Day Sponsored Training Program](./sponsored.qmd) (Government Agency or Company)
- [3-Day Bootcamp](./bootcamp.qmd)(for Beginners)

The course provides a deep understanding of AI and ML techniques and their real-world applications. This program equips participants with the skills needed to apply AI/ML in business and industry.

## Program Highlights

-   **Comprehensive Curriculum**: Covering everything from AI basics to advanced deep learning.
-   **Hands-on Projects**: Real-world case studies and projects.
-   **Expert Faculty**: Delivered by renowned faculty and industry experts.
-   **Flexible Learning**: Designed for working professionals.

Explore the course types and past editions from the menu above to learn more about each module.
